name: Spirit Jellyfish
description: Ethereal beings usually found near places of rest, acting as protectors. They are usually peaceful, but if angered, they attack with deadly poison fired from a distance.

name: Spiritcaller's Cave
description: An abnormally rotund creature brandishing a long and deadly thrusting sword. It uses its weapon with ease, capable of stabs and slams. One should beware if it unleashes its true potential, bloating its body to crush enemies beneath it.

name: Crumbling Farum Azula
description: A complementing pair of creatures extremely well versed in dual-battling. These beings achieve an exceptional balance in combat, resulting in a devastating synergy.

name: Caelid
description: The Red Lion General wielded gravitational powers which he learned in Selia during his younger days. All so he would never have to abandon his beloved but scrawny steed.

name: Radahn Soldier
description: General Radahn's soldiers were all reputed to be masterful warriors, and it was popularly said that the Redmanes knew no weakness.

name: Clayman
description: The warped remains of priests who searched for revelation in service of the ancient dynasty, they employ two sorceries that produce smaller and larger bubbles.
The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.

name: Brother Corhyn
description: Welcome to the Roundtable Hold. I'm Corhyn, a man of the cloth.

name: Note: Demi-human Mobs
description: "Slay the demi-human mob's leader first, and the rest will lose hope and panic

name: Gowry
description: The rotting sickness that afflicts  Millicent has no cure. When the Erdtree flourished, even the demigods could not stave off its effects, despite their nigh godhood.

name: Academy Crystal Cave:
description: The inscrutable Crystalians have but one clear purpose; to safeguard their crystals unto the end.

name: Ancestral Follower
description: Horned folk who eschew letters and metalworking...The ancestral followers keep their distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.

name: Boar
description: The Boars of Limgrave are less aggressive than normal, but should not be assumed to be passive

name: Rileigh the Idle
description: There was a time when Tarnished who had strayed from guidance feared nothing more than utter silence.

name: Duelist
description: Former gladitorial fighters who were exiled from the colloseum. They wield chain axes and hammers, and attack with a frenzied fervor.

name: Hero
description: A stalwart Hero, at home with a battleaxe, descended from a badlands chieftain

name: Carian Study Hall:
description: One of the magic preceptors that served the Carian royals

name: Millicent
description: I would rather trust you than simply continue to spoil from within.

name: Beast Clergyman
description: The Beast Clergyman guards Destined Death, to prevent any from stealing it again. He attacks with his dagger, moving quite swiftly for his size. He also uses Bestial Incantations to fling rocks or fire off devastating shockwaves.

name: Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger
description: Eleonora’s mastery of the sword was such that her onslaught was likened to a whirlwind, but now her legacy is stained by accursed blood.

name: Bandit
description: A dangerous bandit who strikes for weak points. Excels at ranged combat with bows

name: Trolls
description: The lesser giants who fought for the Erdtree during the War against the Giants long ago. Though the giants have lost their minds, they stay inseparable from their swords that are in sad shape—such that the gold plating had flaked away.

name: Elden Throne
description: As the husband of Rennala of Caria, the red-haired Radagon studied sorcery, and as the husband of Queen Marika, he studied incantations.

name: Lesser Black Knife Assassin
description: The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.

name: Lesser Kindred of Rot (Pests)
description: Pale pests who crawl through the lands afflicted by scarlet rot; the abandoned children of the goddess.

name: First-Generation Albinaurics
description: Albinaurics are lifeforms made by human hands. Thus, many believe them to live impure lives, untouched by the Erdtree's grace.

name: Perfumer Tricia
description: Tricia was once known as a healer who dedicated her efforts to treating Misbegotten, Omen, and all those seen as impure. When her efforts failed, she was their companion as they died, watching over them to ensure that they could pass peacefully, free of pain.

name: Burning Slug
description: These slugs appear to be set ablaze, and are constantly burning their surroundings. They breathe fire on anything that gets too close.

name: Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan
description: The sons of House Marais are all sickly born. Little wonder that Maleigh Marais would be so beguiled by the beautiful and fierce goddess who was born into rot.

name: Haligtree Foot Soldiers
description: ...Common soldiers who carry the sacred light. When weakened, they explode to deliver a last-ditch attack.

name: Cuckoo Knight
description: Knights, named for the cuckoo feather on their helmets, who faithfully serve the Academy of Raya Lucaria, and were given free rein to wage war as they please. Like their masters, they use various sorceries for combat, but they are more skilled in melee combat.

name: Sellia, Town of Sorcery
description: A duo of warriors comprised of the female Swordstress, who uses a sword with a whip-like function to attack at medium range and a male Priest who uses spells from afar.

name: Kingsrealm Spirit
description: "... Ahh, Iji, forgive me. These royal grounds were placed in our trust, but we stood no chance."

name: Three Fingers
description: Seek audience with the Three Fingers and the flame of frenzy. If you inherit the flame of frenzy, your flesh will serve as kindling and the girl can be spared ...setting you on the righteous path of lordship.

name: Fire Prelate
description: The weighty frames of the Prelates symbolized the onus of their grave vows as guardians of the flame.

name: Glintstone Sorcerer
description: Glintstone sorcerers are the descendants of astrologers, a fact that the Carians remain aware of. Even if their fate has been long severed from the stars

name: Crystal Snail
description: Snails with crystals growing from their shell. Normally found curled up within their shells blending in to their surroundings, will attack if provoked.

name: Lesser Dragon
description: Lineal descendant of the ancient dragons from the prehistoric era before the Erdtree who gradually shrunk in size and power to survive the test of time.

name: Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: The dead gazed at the skies over the lakes of Limgrave, praying that the dragons' flames would burn them to ash.

name: Ruin-Strewn Precipice
description: It's said these land-bound dragons were once humans heroes who partook in dragon communion, a grave transgression for which they were cursed to crawl the earth upon their bellies, shadows of their former selves.

name: Sealed Tunnel
description: A race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago. They were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

name: Frustrated Spirit
description: All I wanted was to fight. To fight, as a warrior, to the last... So, Why? Why, O guidance of grace, will this door not open?

name: Ash of War: Vow of the Indomitable
Albinauric Archer
description: These warrior Albinaurics have weak legs, which makes them unable to walk. Thus, they rely on their archery to take down opponents. Those found riding Direwolves are a force to be reckoned with.

name: Ringleader’s Evergaol
description: The assassins who carried out the deed were scions of the Eternal City. A group entirely of women, arrayed in armour of silver under cloaks which fooled the eye.

name: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon
description: Ah... Thou... Is it thy wish to be born anew? To become a sweeting, reborn of my beloved egg?
I doubt you could even imagine it... that which commanded the stars, giving life its fullest brilliance - the Elden Ring. Oh! the Elden Ring shattered by someone, or something.

name: Unsightly Catacombs
description: A Vicious beast that has lost all reason, attacking indiscriminately.

name: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
description: Once a grand master at the Academy of Raya Lucaria, now exiled and residing near the Hermit Village.

name: Albinaurics
description: Albinaurics are lifeforms made by human hands. Thus, many believe them to live impure lives, untouched by the Erdtree's grace.

name: Tanith
description: I am Tanith, the proprietress of this house. An honour to have you.

name: Dragonbarrow
description: Greyoll was the mother of all dragons, dwarfing all who stood before her like a looming mountain.

name: Lesser Crystalian
description: The inscrutable Crystalians have but one clear purpose; to safeguard their crystals unto the end.

name: Limgrave
description: The Deathbirds are graveyard fire keepers; it is said they rake out the ashen remains of the dead from their kilns.

name: Ash of War: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
Hermit Merchant (Mountaintops of the Giants)
description: Well, there you are again. Divorce from one's trade does not come easily.

name: Mountaintops of the Giants
description: The Fire Giant is a survivor of the War against the Giants. Upon realizing the flames of their forge would never die, Queen Marika marked him with a curse.

name: Volcano Manor
description: Mechanical constructs with various bladed weapons used to slay any who get in their path. The real horror lies underneath their iron frame, as it can quickly grab and take you within to meet your doom.

name: About Fast Travel to Sites of Grace
Dung Eater
description: I am the Dung Eater! A scourge upon the living!

name: Godskin Apostle and Godskin Noble
description: They are found in their spirit forms, spawned by the opportunist Spirit-Caller Snail.

name: Bloodhound Knight
description: The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.
The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads at night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.

name: White Mask Varré
description: Oh yes... Tarnished, are we? Come to the Lands Between for the Elden Ring, hmm?

name: Azula Beastman
description: Beastmen from doomed Farum Azula, the slowly crumbling ruins in the skies. These ruins are said to be the remains of a giant mausoleum enshrining an ancient dragon, guarded by chosen beastmen who wield weapons clad in lightning.

name: Bloody Wolf
description: The Wolf is cunning, steadfast and deadly. These warriors have no fear and face down death with unmatched vigor and pride.

name: Ash of War: Royal Knight's Resolve
Owl
description: Nocturnal creatures, owls can often be seen perched on cliffsides, looking for preys.

name: Note: The Lord of Frenzied Flame
Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm
description: A silent seeker of sorcery, who had gone so far as to make contact with the primeval current, Wilhelm was led by guidance into confrontation with his friend Vargram, and it is said that he was then taken prisoner in Roundtable Hold.

name: Note: Below the Capital
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant.

name: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman
description: I won't forget... again... mine appetite... My sin...

name: Man-Serpent Sorcerer
description: It is said that long ago, the elder serpent that dwelled on Mt. Gelmir devoured a demigod, and the birth of the man-serpents followed.

name: Deer
description: Deer roam freely in the plains on Limgrave, now that hunters have all but disappeared

name: Soldier of Godrick
description: That depraved lot are obsessed with sacrificing Tarnished like you for the sake of "grafting".

name: Albus
description: Please, no. Dear me! I haven't a clue. No secrets lie with me, not a one.

name: Nox Monk
description: Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

name: Merchant Kalé
description: You are a Tarnished, I can see it. And I can also see... That you're not after my throat.

name: Lichdragon Fortissax
description: After Godwyn the Golden became the Prince of Death, the ancient dragon fought long and hard against the Death within its companion. Alas, victory was never achieved and its only reward was corruption.

name: Fire Monk
description: The Fire Monks are guardians of the flame of ruin, forbidden by the Erdtree and said to be kept high in the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Edgar the Revenger
description: ...Ahh the poor fellow... Gone perfectly mad.

name: Lesser Burial Watchdog
description: A living construct fashioned after felines and hounds, made to watch over catacombs. These constructs wield massive stone weaponry and are attuned to different elements.

name: Ancestral Follower Shaman
description: The ancestral followers live a distance from the Erdtree, awaiting new buds. They are certain to sprout from their very flesh, and indeed, their souls.

name: Bear
description: Big creatures found roaming the florid meadows of the Lands Between.

name: Stealth
description: Create your character in FromSoftware’s refined action-RPG and define your playstyle by experimenting with a wide variety of weapons, magical abilities, and skills found throughout the world. Charge into battle, pick off enemies one-by-one using stealth, or even call upon allies for aid. Many options are at your disposal as you decide how to approach exploration and combat.

name: Witch-Hunter Jerren
description: I am Jerren. Foolish old warrior, and witness. Incidentally, do you like a good festival, from time to time?

name: Smithing Master Hewg
description: You're a new face. No matter, it's all the same.

name: Ainsel River
description: The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was their weapon.

name: Siofra Aqueduct (Duo)
description: An imposing stone statue, usually found guarding certain areas. It wields a massive greatsword to fire off a devastating wave of energy, and it can switch to its halberd to whip up a whirlwind.

name: Fallen Hawks Soldier
description: When the band's last embers were used up in their long search, they began to burn the bones of their fellows, acquiring the cold ghostflame, but sealing their fate as dwellers of the underground for all eternity.

name: Renna
description: Unless of course, thou shouldst take the crown?"

name: Consecrated Snowfield
description: The name of the ancient troll warrior Theodorix lives on — as a hero of the War against the Giants.

name: Vargram the Raging Wolf
description: One of the first Tarnished to arrive at the Roundtable, Vargram was named after the white wolf pelt on his helm.

name: War Counselor Iji
description: I am Iji. A blacksmith who once served the Carian royals. An old codger who refuses to retire his rusty hammer. So, here I am, still quietly plying my trade, on this spot.

name: Lesser Bloodhound Knight
description: The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.

name: Caria Manor
description: A spiritual knight atop a steed, wielding a polearm capable of casting sorceries. Her horse allows her great mobility, and her weapon allows her to cast a deadly Greatbow to take down her enemies

name: Elemer of the Briar
description: Elemer of the Briar, the Bell Bearing Hunter, snatched the sword from the site of his looming execution, and furnished it with battle skills from his home of Eochaid

name: Note (Waypoint Ruins)
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant. Contains information about waypoint ruins. Further details are available only to paying customers.

name: Skeletal Militiamen
description: Militiamen who live in Death, and will continue to rise again until properly finished off.

name: Albinauric Village Spirit
description: ... This village is done for. Please, even if it's just you, old Albus, hide well and still your breath.

name: Prophet
description: A seer ostracized for inauspicious prophecies. Well versed in healing incantations

name: Land Squirt
description: The firm, fleshy tubes of the creatures remain rooted to the spot, spraying poisonous liquid over their surroundings.

name: Raging Wolf Set
description: Armor worn by Vargram the Bloody Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold.

name: Sleep Arrow
description: Sleep arrow used with bows.

name: Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Cower, before Maliketh, Marika’s Black Blade.

name: Festering Fingerprint Vyke, also known as Vyke, Knight of the Roundtable
description: No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Lone Wolves roam the Lands Between in packs, overwhelming targets with their agility

name: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Grave Wardens protect the secrets of the ancients, but the corruption of the land has affected them too

name: Demi-Human Queen
description: The matriarch of the Demi-Human tribes, she towers above her subordinates, and is capable of using sorceries despite her appearance.

name: Crucible Knight and Misbegotten Warrior
description: And upon their southern edge is Redmane Castle, in which a festival of combat is being held. I'd heard whispers of such festivities before... doesn't the notion set your breast aflutter!

name: Banished Knight
description: Many knights were sent to the fringes, where they were forced to start anew with only despair for company.

name: Flame Guardians
description: Masked humanoids tasked with protecting Giants’ Flame incantations from any intruders, wielding torchpoles and fire magic of their own.

name: Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit
description: A guardian that sleeps deep within the crypt of Stormveil Castle. It is quick and very aggressive when it attacks and moves similar to a centipede with its multiple legs. The Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit also features two large arms and a tail that it mainly uses to swing around or to slam the ground.

name: Blackflame Monk
description: The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians.

name: Lightseeker Hyetta
description: Hello? Is someone there? My name is Hyetta, and I'm journeying in search of the distant light.

name: :
description: Though he has stifled his panic within the dark confines of his helmet, he rampages as if driven mad when agitated by bloodshed or the humming of insects. This mad soldier is all that is left of a broken gladiator.

name: Queen of the Full Moon Set
Capital Outskirts:
description: After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.

name: Note: Imp Shades
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant.

name: Demi-Human Queen Maggie
description: Sovereign Demi-Human of the village in Mt. Gelmir. She is assisted by not only her followers, but also by fellow Academy Sorcerers. Her staff can cast a burst of magic projectiles, but she will often use it to smash her foes into submission.

name: Lesser Cemetery Shade
description: Insect-ridden grave keepers.

name: Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
description: Description goes here

name: Putrid Corpse
description: Their movements are dull and confused... True death does not come easily for them.

name: Ash of War: Flame of the Redmanes
Kaiden Sellswords
description: These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback.

name: Knight of Zamor
description: These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

name: Lesser Mad Pumpkin Head
description: Though he has stifled his panic within the dark confines of his helmet, he rampages as if driven mad when agitated by bloodshed or the humming of insects.

name: Wretch
description: As poor, purposeless and naked as the day they were born. A nice club is all they have.

name: Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Enormously large and lethargic Golem that slowly storms into battle when it becomes aware of your presence.

name: Champion
description: Equipped with a Sacred Seal and an Axe, the Champion can burn foes from a distance or take them head on in melee combat. They are ferocious fighters, who do not fear death.

name: Confessor
description: A church spy adept at covert operations. Equally adept with a sword as they are with incantations

name: Shabriri
description: May chaos take the world! May chaos take the world!

name: Turtle
description: Turtles are slow and passive creatures hunted by those seeking their meat, said to have curative properties.

name: Gelmir Hero's Grave
description: Description goes here

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdogs
description: The Watchdogs, battered and broken over their lengthy tenure, rule the catacombs and are even said to command the imps.

name: D, Hunter of the Dead
description: I’m known as D. I hunt Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.

name: Miriel, Pastor of Vows
description: I Welcome you, to the Church of Vows. I am Miriel, steward of this sacred chamber. My apologies, for the unseemly state of affairs. Do you know the origin of this place?

name: Kindred of Rot
description: Large, prawn-like creatures that worship the rot itself. It nimbly skitters while in combat, utilizing its glaive and homing threads to overcome their opponents.

name: Siofra River:
description: Alas, the Dragonkin Soldiers never attained immortality, and perished as decrepit, pale imitations of their skyborn kin.

name: Guardian
description: Warriors who eternally watch and protect the Erdtree and its offspring. Their large swordspears and their tendencies to group up can make them tricky opponents to dispatch.

name: Lesser Red Wolf of Radagon
description: Extremely large wolves with scarlet fur, often found as the alpha of their pack. It is capable of casting Magic Glintblades, using them along with their blistering speed.

name: Teardrop Scarabs
description: These scarabs often roll clumps of valuable ashes of war during their labors, along with crimson and cerulean tears. They are very skittish, and will often flee when spotted.

name: Raya Lucaria Foot Soldiers
description: Foot Soldiers usually guarding camps and ruins with their fellow Soldiers, they wander around the Raya Lucaria Academy located within Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Aided by his two ferocious dogs, this Priest is capable of the deadliest hemorrhage-inducing attacks.

name: Swamp of Aeonia
description: Even after his lord was fled, Commander O'Neil continued to brandish his flag in the devastation of the rot-eaten field of battle, the sole veteran who remembers that battle with pride.

name: Ash of War: Waves of Darkness
Mending Rune of the Fell Curse
Nomadic Merchant Liurnia of the Lakes
Troll Knight
description: Called into service when the Queen invoked an oath they swore, the trolls are treated as true knights of Caria, and fight arm in arm with their human comrades.

name: Nameless White Mask
description: Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood, none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varre, that is; but he was an exception.

name: Demi-Human Chiefs
description: They'll rush in and beat you to a pulp. You'll end up just like me.

name: Abnormal Stone Clusters
description: Odd segmented stone creatures with a singular eye, often keeping watch over the Evergaols. It is unknown what their true purpose is for. They are fairly weak, only able to swing their body and explode themselves in a last ditch effort.

name: Living Jar
description: Though the jars are brought to life by human flesh and blood, they are all rather kindly folk. Perhaps they were made to be better than their innards.

name: Roderika
description: Everyone who came with me. They crossed the sea for me. They fought, for me. Heh... Only to have their arms taken. Their legs taken. Even their heads...taken. Taken and stuck to the spider.

name: Noble Sorcerer
description: Noble Sorcerers are frail old men wearing tattered garbs and a dirty yellow cape. They use a standard glintstone staff as both a sorcery catalyst and walking stick.

name: Misbegotten
description: The misbegotten are held to be a punishment for making contact with the Crucible, and from birth they are treated as slaves, or worse.

name: Radahn Foot Soldiers
description: Base level soldiers, serving General Radahn's army.

name: Altus Plateau
description: Lansseax was the sister of Fortissax. It is said that she took the form of a human to commune with the knights as a priestess of the ancient dragon cult.

name: Giant Dragonfly
description: Large aggressive insects that buzz around incessantly, they often attack when their targets are preoccupied with other dangers. Their erratic nature makes them hard to hit, but they are easily felled when they do.

name: Nomads
description: A member of a tribe that was entombed in the earth so as to bury the maddening disease that followed them. Able to emit the terrible flame of frenzy from his eyes, but has low HP and is frail, unable to take much in the way of punishment.

name: Rotten Stray
description: ...Stray dog.

name: Glintstone Miner
description: The ever-working miners of the tunnels, tasked with harvesting crystals from deep beneath. Their staff allows them to summon a drill to shatter rock and enemies alike.

name: Mohgwyn Palace
description: Welcome, honored guest.

name: Grape Spirit
description: ... Maiden, dear maiden, where are you? Please, take my grapes.

name: Leyndell Foot Soldiers
description: ...Foot Soldiers protecting the royal capital of Leyndell.

name: Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood
description: Juno Hoslow had a younger brother who was all talk and no trousers. His inability to commit to action was such that Juno inherited the Hoslow legacy without resistance, granting him the freedom to shower his little brother with adoration.

name: School of Graven Mages
description: The primeval current is a forbidden tradition of glintstone sorcery. To those who cleave to its teachings, the act of collecting sorcerers to fashion them into the seeds of stars is but another path of scientific inquiry.

name: Aeonian Spirit
description: Sublime, I tell you. The very first flower of Aeonia bloomed on this very spot. Malenia, may you blossom into a goddess.

name: Wandering Nobles
description: Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead beings are the pitiful product of unending life. They are most commonly found struggling to maintain balance while roaming the fields of The Lands Between. Surely they were in search of something once - but whatever it was has long been forgotten.

name: Edgar
description: I'm Edgar, warden of this castle as ordained by Lord Godrick himself. But you can see how things have turned out.

name: Land Octopus
Siofra River Spirit
description: Lord of Blood, your eminence. I beg you, grant me a seat at the table of the dynasty. Long live the Mohgwyn Dynasty. Long live! The Mohgwyn Dynasty!

name: Latenna
description: Let's try again. I'm Latenna. An Albinauric, the same as Old Albus.

name: Mt. Gelmir
description: Another Demi-Human Queen found sheltered deep within a cave in Mt. Gelmir. She possesses a deep-seated rage, and will go berserk upon being struck.

name: Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Smarag was a devourer of sorcerers, and over time, his body became corrupted by their glintstones.

name: Melina
description: I can play the role of maiden. Turning rune fragments into strength. To aid you in your search for the Elden Ring. You need only take me with you.

name: Malefactor's Evergaol
description: The monks came to the land of Liurnia in pursuit of a fugitive who stole their fire.

name: Depraved Perfumer
description: These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.

name: Giant Land Octopus
description: Fast, aggressive, and deadly, these larger Land Octopuses are a force to be reckoned with. They often use their tentacles to attack, and cutting them off is often a temporary solution, as they can quickly grow it back.

name: Jar Bairn
description: Hello coz, what are you doing here?

name: Cemetery Shade
description: Insect-ridden grave keepers.

name: Haligtree Soldier
description: Loyal Soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. While rather unimpressive on their own, they are often found in large groups, using numbers to their advantage.

name: Ash of War: Rain of Arrows
Eagle
description: Majestic Eagles that still roam the Lands Between to this day. Their feathers and feet can be used for a myriad of crafting materials.

name: Godskin Apostle
description: Description goes here

name: Ranni the Witch
description: I am the witch Ranni. I stole Death long ago, and search now for the dark path.

name: Giant Rat
description: [They] swarm upon their victims... These vermin seem to multiply incessantly.

name: Nomadic Merchant
description: What do you need? I don't want any trouble.

name: Blaidd
description: Kalé sent you, did he? Ever the bloody busybody. Hmm. Maybe to him, you don't seem so strange.

name: Kenneth Haight
description: Hello? Is anybody there?

name: Mausoleum Knight
description: A self-inflicted curse ties the spirits of these loyal knights to the land, having willingly beheaded themselves so that they may serve their masters in death.

name: Celebrant
description: Dancers at the festivities in Dominula, the village of windmills.

name: Warrior
description: A twinblade wielding warrior from a nomadic tribe. An origin of exceptional technique

name: Omenkiller and Miranda, the Blighted Bloom
description: Throughout history, perfumers have prized miranda pollen.

name: Ash of War: Sacred Ring of Light
Old Knight Istvan
description: Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survive to this day.

name: Bloody Finger Okina
description: The more he sharpened his mind, the more the absurdities of the world came into stark relief. And so Okina renounced it all, and rose to a higher plane. There was only himself. His katana. And its mastery.

name: Finger Reader Crones
description: You, please, I can read them. Your fingers, please, your fingers...″

name: Miquella's Haligtree
description: Loretta, once a royal Carian Knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

name: Grave Warden Duelist
description: Duelists who were exiled from the colosseum.

name: Guardian Golem
description: One of the many constructs found across the Lands Between. It wields a large halberd to attack, along with being able to breath fire on anything below it.

name: Lesser Cleanrot Knight
description: The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.

name: Bloody Finger Nerijus
description: If it isn't Nerijus, The Bloody Finger.

name: Stormveil Castle:
description: Someone must extinguish thy flame.

name: Farum Azula Dragons
description: The ancient dragons of Farum Azula possess sturdy stone scales and immense command over lightning. They will fervently protect their domain from any intruders.

name: Astrologer
description: A scholar who reads fate in the stars. Heir to the school of glintstone sorcery

name: Battlemage
description: Whenever war broke out and the academy sealed its gates, only Haima's scholars dared venture outside. Seclusion is no way to foster discovery; it is only a convenient form of escape.

name: Liurnia of the Lakes:
description: In the time when there was no Erdtree, death was burned in ghostflame. Deathbirds were the keepers of that fire. The birds are graveyard fire keepers; it is said they rake out the ashen remains of the dead from their kilns.

name: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado
Writheblood Ruins:
description: Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.

name: Weeping Evergaol
description: These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

name: Mountaintops of the Giants
description: Commander Niall, veteran of Castle Sol, offered his prosthesis in exchange for the lives of defeated knights held prisoner. He went on to lead these men as an army of no nation.
Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.

name: Lesser Sanguine Noble
description: Elite assassins dressed in ornate garbs and wielding blood-caked rapiers. These nobles revel in blood sorcery, exhibiting a high level of proficiency in the dark arts as well as mastery of assassination techniques and swordplay.

name: Deeproot Depths
description: The five greatest warriors of Fia, the Deathbed Companion. They each come in waves, and wield various weapons of their choosing.

name: Exile Soldier
description: ...Soldiers sent to the penal colonies, who were required to keep their faces hidden.

name: Beastman of Farum Azula
description: Beastmen from the doomed Farum Azula, the slowly crumbling ruins in the skies. These ruins are said to be the remains of a giant mausoleum enshrining an ancient dragon, guarded by chosen beastmen who wield weapons clad in lightning.

name: Sellia Evergaol
description: Hugues came from Sellia to study the Haima Conspectus at the academy, where he became a battlemage.

name: Pidia, Carian Servant
description: But please, can you offer poor ill-starred Pidia... A little something by way of compensation?

name: Ash of War: Through and Through
Lux Ruins basement
description: Sovereign Demi-Human creature dwelling under Altus Plateau ruins.

name: Note: Flask of Wondrous Physick
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant. Contains information about a Flask of Wondrous Physickk. Further details are available only to paying customers.

name: Murkwater Cave
description: I'm Patches. Patches the Untethered.

name: Blackguard Big Boggart
description: Never met someone with a taste for prawns I couldn't trust.

name: Nepheli Loux, Warrior
description: Let the scars I carve remind them.

name: Nokron, Eternal City
description: Ancestral spirits exist as a phenomenon beyond the purview of the Erdtree. Life sprouts from death, as it does from birth. Such is the way of the living.

name: Mausoleum Foot Soldier
description: ...Headless foot soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.

name: Cathedral of Manus Celes
description: Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.

name: Miranda Sprout
description: Sweet little carnivorous blossoms that feed upon human flesh. They creep slowly, scattering toxic pollen. They are vulnerable to fire.

name: Road's End Catacombs
description: A strange snail-like creature that gives off a pale glow. While weak on their own, they summon forth spirits from beyond to fight on their behalf. But once the snail dies, the spirit will vanish.

name: Sheep
description: The wild sheep of the Lands Between have been roaming the wilds ever since The Shattering. They are timid and will often run away when spotted, with some even balling up and rolling away.

name: Lesser Misbegotten Warrior
description: Aggressive and feral, the Misbegotten sees nothing but rage

name: Miquella
description: My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a god - he is the most fearsome Empyrean of all." - Malenia

name: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater
description: The knife-wielding Ogress Anastasia, known to have eaten countless Tarnished while disguised as a Finger Maiden.

name: Skeleton Mage
description: Skeleton Mages are usually found on graveyards in the Lands Between. They rise out of the ground, often found in groups, wielding scythes and casting ghostly skulls to chase their targets.

name: Recusant Henricus
description: An invader serving the Volcano Manor, tasked with hunting down fellow Tarnished. His large mace can make quick of any unfortunate targets.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura
description: Be on your way. Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits

name: Vulgar Militiamen
description: In the Lands Between, the small were scorned, and so they formed their vulgar militia as a means to make a living, albeit in ignominy.

name: Grand Cloister
description: A malformed star born in the flightless void far away. Once destroyed an Eternal City and took away their sky.

name: Ash of War: White Shadow's Lure
Lazuli Sorcerer
description: Unorthodox sorcerers of the Lazuli Conspectus, who wield swords and shields. They can easily rush down enemies, and are able to swing a magic greatsword to cut down foes.

name: Oracle Envoy
description: Monstrous band of musicians who employ sacred arts. It is said that when Oracle Envoys appear playing their pipes, they do so to herald the arrival of a new god, or age.

name: Diallos
description: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood.

name: 70k
description: Description goes here

name: Sorcerer Rogier
description: The pleasure's mine. Rogier's the name. A sorcerer, as you might have guessed.

name: Gaol Cave
description: A former gladiator that has succumbed to his bloodlust and was locked away deep in a cave. He wields a particularly large battle axe than he can use with ease, along with releasing a bolstering war cry.

name: Prisoner
description: A prisoner bound in an iron mask. Studied in glintstone sorcery, having lived among the elite prior to sentencing.
...Heed my words. I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella.

name: Baleful Shadow
description: I turned my back on the Two Fingers and we each have been cursing the other since. The Baleful Shadows... are their assassins.

name: Demi-Human
description: Demi-Humans are small in stature, but they have a violent, brutish disposition. Though they seem somewhat intelligent, when night falls, their blood boils and they become feral.

name: Highwayman
description: Former foot soldiers who have since turned to banditry. They ambush any who approach, wishing to take their valuables for themselves.

name: Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen
Second-Generation Albinaurics
description: Albinaurics are lifeforms made by human hands. Thus, many believe them to live impure lives, untouched by the Erdtree's grace.

name: Warhawks
description: Stormhawks that have had their talons sliced off, so that razor-fine swords could be grafted in their place. They react with extreme aggression, using their mobility in combination with their deadly talons.

name: Thops
description: For a small donation, I'd be happy to share my knowledge.

name: Imps
description: These spirits are well suited to causing a disturbance, moving nimbly like pests and hurling magic pots.

name: Gael Tunnel
description: A large lesser dragon with bronze-colored scales covering its body. Magma Wyrms inhabit deep cave systems and volcanos, thriving within lava-flooded environments.

name: Preceptor Seluvis
description: I don't know what it is the mistress sees in a provincial Tarnished like you, but since we have the misfortune of serving the same Lady, I ask that you kindly try not to drag us all down with you.

name: Greyoll's Dragonbarrow:
description: Guardians of the Minor Erdtrees, infested with Scarlet Rot. Their large staff can knock foes away, and their slam attack releases a cloud of rot, quickly leading to enemies’ demise.

name: Altus Plateau
description: One of the Ancient Dragons, who had sturdy stone scales and wielded powerful lightning, Lansseax is an extremely deadly foe. She attacks with a combination of fire breath, claw swipes, and her imposing Lightning Glaive.

name: Caelid
description: Ekzykes, Dragon Communion Revenger, did not forget his hatred even as he succumbed to the scarlet rot.

name: Auriza Hero's Grave
description: Large, heavy and fully armored. Ordovis is a deadly foe, especially with backup. He can spin his greatsword for a devastating slam, manifest wings to take flight, and summon a tail to strike from behind.

name: Haligtree Knight
description: Knights who have vowed to serve Miquella's Haligtree. They are skilled in using both magical and holy skills, loyally protecting the rotted Haligtree to the very end.

name: Avionette Soldier
description: Marionette soldiers with avian features that were created to serve a sorcerer. Equipped with long-hafted scythes and swords, they also attack from the skies by lobbing fire pots. Can sometimes malfunction when damaged

name: Samurai
description: A capable fighter from the distant land of reeds. Handy with Katana and Longbows.

name: Raya Lucaria Academy
description: Hush, little culver.

name: Info Item
description: "Yes, surely this is the moon that young Rennala gazed upon."

name: Elden Throne
description: It is said that long ago, the Greater Will sent a golden star bearing a beast into the Lands Between, which would later become the Elden Ring.

name: Nox Swordstress
description: Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

name: Vagabond
description: A knight exiled from their homeland to wander. A solid, armor-clad origin.

name: Marionette Soldier
description: Marionette soldiers were created to serve a sorcerer.

name: Raya Lucaria Soldier
description: The soldiers of Raya Lucaria were also known as the Cuckoos.

name: Note: Gravity's Advantage
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant.

name: Knight Bernahl
description: Let me ask you something.

name: Fia
description: Greetings, great champion called by grace. I am Fia. Circumstances have compelled my stay at the Roundtable Hold.

name: Thorn Sorcerer
description: The guilty, their eyes gouged by thorns, lived in eternal darkness. There, they discovered the blood star.

name: Commoner
description: The boards that hang from their necks depicts a sprawling tree, its roots and branches forming two holes. A self imposed shackle, that displayed their allegiance to the Erdtree.

name: Gideon Ofnir
description: As a Tarnished who wishes to stand before the Elden Ring and become Elden Lord, I am accumulating knowledge. To be all-knowing.

name: Volcano Manor
description: The great serpent of Mt. Gelmir that swallowed Praetor Rykard. Attacks with poisonous spit, bites, and slams.

name: Lionel the Lionhearted
description: When this chivalrous dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.

name: Royal Grave Evergaol
description: An Evergaol prisoner wielding a vicious sword and the void with murderous intent.

name: Note: Unseen Assassins
description: A note sold by a nomadic merchant.

name: Glintstone Dragon
description: Lesser dragons that have been overcome by glintstones from the sorcerers they have devoured. They spew a stream of magic breath and fire off Comets from their maws.

name: Great Horned Tragoth
description: Tragoth is a famed knight of assistance. Countless Tarnished, facing adversity in the Lands Between, have survived thanks only to the Great Horned One's aid.

name: Master Lusat
description: Once a grand master at the Academy of Raya Lucaria, now exiled and residing near the town of Sellia.

name: Miranda the Blighted Bloom
description: Miranda, maiden of the Flower Crucible is said to have been the very first of this breed.

name: Enchanted Knight
description: These Knights have embraced the power of Glintstone, facing enemies in melee combat while simultaneously casting spells. They often seek out and destroy those who use magic for nefarious purposes.

name: Godefroy The Grafted
description: Description goes here
Trolls are descended from the giants, and their hammers were supposedly once used as ceremonial smithing tools. In the distant past, smithing was considered divine.

name: Wild Mouflon
description: Wild Mouflons become hostile when threatened and fight their aggressors by charging forward and striking them with their large horns.

name: Springhare
description: A species unique to The Lands Between, ever fleeing from danger and confrontation.

name: Omen
description: Large malformed creatures found across the lands. Often resented for their appearance and stature, they are often used as fodder or are forced deep underground, never to be remembered.

name: Redmane Knight
description: Knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Their red plumes is a symbol of Radahn's pedigree as Lord Radagon's son - the mane of the proud Red Lion.

name: Godrick Knight
description: Loyal knights of Godrick the Golden, who still serve him to this day. These warriors are often aided in combat by soldiers or hostile dogs, therefore posing a threat to the unprepared and novice.

name: Runes
description: The Dragonlord whose seat lies at the heart of the storm beyond time is said to have been Elden Lord in the age before the Erdtree. Once his god was fled, the lord continued to await its return.

name: Man-Serpent
description: It is said that long ago, the elder serpent that dwelled on Mt. Gelmir devoured a demigod, and the birth of the man-serpents followed.

name: Enia
description: The Fingers guide us all. And you Tarnished, you are here to take, are you not?

name: High Page
description: Strong and dexterous servants of the Nobility, commited to keep them out of harm's way. Specially compared with their common counterparts.

name: Hermit Merchant (Leyndell)
description: Well, there you are again. Divorce from one's trade does not come easily.

name: Gael Tunnel
description: Those who have performed the Dragon Communion will find their humanity slowly slipping away. Once they fully succumb to their fate, they are left no more than wyrms that crawl the earth.

name: Moongrum Carian Knight
description: The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.

name: Flame Chariots
description: Large mobile weapons bearing the faces of Giants. They use their large flaming cannons to burn any who get in their way.

name: Nokron, Eternal City
description: Those of the Eternal City have created a special type of Silver Tear, capable of completely mimicking its opponent, along with any spells, skills and armaments they have.

name: D, Beholder of Death
description: Ah, aah... D-da...ri... Ngh...nnngh...

name: Leyndell Knights
description: Knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. The golden canopy atop their helmets represent the honor of standing among the tree's defenders.

name: Kingsrealm Ruins
description: An obscene and disturbing abomination, blend of a spider-like creature and human limbs resulting in a quite resourceful fighter at close range.

name: Perfumer
description: In time past, the role of perfumer was much respected; a blessed apothecary in the eyes of the many. But after entering the battlefields of the Shattering they performed no such role, trading their aromatics for poisons and explosives

name: Please note that this page contains heavy spoilers, including end of game dialog.
Mausoleum Soldier
description: ...Soldiers who confound foes by disappearing and reappearing at will.

name: Giant Bat
description: Large bats often seen flying across the lands at nighttime, preying on anything unfortunate enough to get caught between their razor-sharp fangs. Due to their frailty, they often rely on their numbers to gang up on enemies.

name: Godrick Soldiers
description: The soldiers who serve Godrick the Grafted are what remains of the army that fled the royal capital of the Erdtree.

name: Scaly Misbegotten
description: The misbegotten are held to be a punishment for making contact with the Crucible, and from birth they are treated as slaves, or worse.

name: Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave:

name: Study Hall Spirit
description: O Celestial Globe, transmit to prosperity. The wisdom of the moon and stars. And obscure, forever, the transgressions of the princess.
The living rampart of the Erdtree, the Tree Sentinels are the standard to which all defenders of the Erdtree aspire.

name: Lesser Alabaster Lord
description: A race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago.

name: Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
description: Darriwil is nothing but a traitor. And in need of a fitting end to his tale.

name: Volcano Manor
description: Join the Serpent King, as family...

name: Godrick the Grafted
description: I command thee, kneel!

name: War-Dead Catacombs
description: A Scarlet Rot-filled beast. A Tree Spirit creature that radiates Scarlet Rot

name: Character Creation
description: The most common face among the Tarnished. After all, they were all warriors once.

name: Bestial Sanctum
description: Valiant Gargoyles that have been mended with blackened corpse wax.

name: Page
description: ...Pages who serve the nobility and are mindful to keep them out of harm's way. Uses a piercing sword and crossbow to defend [their] master.

name: Crab
description: Crabs are found near the swamps, lakes, and beaches of the Lands Between. They are small and weak, often hunted for their eggs and meat. But those must beware their larger brethern, who will attack any who disturb them.

name: Starcallers
description: Scavengers desperately digging around craters found in the wake of meteorite strikes, they dub themselves Starcallers.

name: The
description: The network test is a preliminary verification test in which those selected as testers play the game prior to the official launch of the service.

name: Boc the Seamster
description: Boc the Seamster, at your service.

name: Iron Fist Alexander
description: I am Alexander, also known as the Iron Fist. And as you can see, I'm stuck here.

name: Night Maidens
description: Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

name: Irina
description: My good father secreted me out the castle, but decided himself to stay. He says it's his duty, as commander. I... I fear for father's life.

name: Sanguine Noble
description: Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.

name: Twinsage Sorcerer
description: Raya Lucaria sorcerers who wear a stone crown. T

name: Lesser Crucible Knight
description: Stalwart knights that once served the First Elden Lord, and are now scattered across the Lands Between. Wielding swords, spears, and an array of primal incantations, these enemies are not ones to go down easy.

name: Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight
Skeletal Bandits
description: The remains of former bandits that will continue to rise again until properly finished off.

name: Rya
description: A pleasure to meet you, Brave Tarnished.

name: Greyoll’s Dragonbarrow
description: A large and powerful Great Dragon, found guarding a narrow bridge. Like its cousins, it will utilize stomps, breath attacks, bites to take down any who try to cross.

name: Giant Crab
description: Large crustaceans with an appetite that matches their sheer size. They often use their claws to crush their prey, and can spray breath that can have varying effects, depending on their environment.

name: Fell Twins
description: The Twin Omens ambush anyone who tries to head for the Divine Tower. One wields an axe, that prefers to rush enemies down, and the other has a sword, and prefers to stay at a distance.

name: Queen Marika
description: Now, Queen Marika the Eternal is nowhere to be found, and in the Night of the Black Knives Godwyn the Golden was first to perish. Soon, Marika's offspring, demigods all, claimed the shards of the Elden Ring. The mad taint of their newfound strength triggered the Shattering.

name: Leyndell, Capital of Ash
description: Queen Marika has high hopes for us.

name: Revenant
description: A grotesque amalgamation of limbs, the Revenant is a creature with the body structure of an arachnid and the face of a human. Much like a spider, it possesses many limbs that seem to have been grafted onto its body, taken from diseased humans. The Revenant is capable of traveling through portals it creates with a peculiar form of magic, swiftly emerging behind a foe to catch them off guard.

name: Leyndell Soldier
description: The soldiers of Leyndell fight their battles defensively. During the Shattering, they were the ramparts that fortified the royal capital.

name: Mountaintops of the Giants
description: The ice dragons were once lords of the mountaintops long ago, until they were defeated by the Fire Giants and chased from the peak.

name: Mad Tongue Alberich
description: Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.

name: Yelough Anix Tunnel in Consecrated Snowfield
Inquisitor Ghiza
description: A menacing agent of the Volcano Manor, wielding a colossal weapon of torture.

name: Altus Plateau
description: The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.

name: Stillwater Cave
description: The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.

name: Sorceress Sellen
description: Tarnished, are we? A wonder you should turn up here.

name: Fingercreeper
description: Extremely grotesque creatures resembling malformed hands with many fingers. They often lie in wait, crushing victims as they pass by, and can fire immobilizing projectiles from the ring on their finger.

name: Recommended levels for matchmaking, by location
